title: Calories in Black Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in black grapes per 100g, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Fresh, seedless black grapes, eaten with skin, no added sugar or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels for packaged grapes when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of black grapes provide ~69 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dried into raisins per 100 g dry weight
With 1 oz cheese added per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g black grapes?
faqs.a: About 69 kcal per 100g fresh black grapes.

faqs.q: Are black grapes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, ~16g natural sugars per 100g, contributing to the carbs.

faqs.q: What's the protein in black grapes?
faqs.a: Low at ~0.7g per 100g; they're not a protein source.
Yes, about 0.9g dietary fiber per 100g, mostly in the skin.

faqs.q: How do calories compare to green grapes?
faqs.a: Similar; black grapes have ~69 kcal per 100g, green around 67-70 kcal.
